descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]Pure Waters - Waterfalls is now a part of my all-in-one graphic mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?]PURITY[/url].[/size][/center]

[center][youtube]YNUxJVTocI4[/youtube][youtube]Gu_Bv9XjMlA[/youtube][/center]

Waterfalls add-on for Pure Waters vastly improves waterfalls effects, making waterfalls areas more natural, wild, and unique. Technically, it simply replaces meshes used by Bethesda by other vanilla meshes. It also adds or modifies landscape components around waterfalls for a better result.

[center][b]
COMPATIBILITY:[/b][/center]

This mod is compatible with any water mod as long as it doesn't modify waterfalls. Modded waterfalls meshes should be compatible, but I can't promise. You have to try it by yourself and report here.

Dedicated waterfalls mods such like [b]Skyfalls and Skymills[/b] ARE NOT COMPATIBLE. Do not use it along this mod. If you find other mod which conflict with this one, please report it.

Landscape mods may conflict with mine if they modify something around waterfalls.

[center][b]
INSTALLATION:[/b][/center]
Just extract the file in your Skyrim folder. Load order should not be very important but I recommend to load it just after your water mod.

[center][b]
CONTENT:[/b][/center]
Main rivers and streams now benefit from new waterfalls. Most of waterfalls from Skyrim should be covered.


[center][b]KNOWN BUGS AND FPS HIT:[/b][/center]
Some minor flickering/clipping may appears but nothing important. Might be improved in the future. You may notice minor fps loss around some waterfalls, depending your rig.
author: Laast

files.name: Pure Waters - Waterfalls
files.changelogHtml:
Initial release.
Whiterun and Windhelm areas covered.
